gblock('gogo', 'text', 'Text-1', function($text, $counter) use ($page) { if ($counter == 0) { print $page->block('gogo', 'text', 'Text-1') . '2
  • ' . $text . '' . $counter; }}, 1); ?> gblock('gogo2', 'text', 'Text-1', function($text, $counter) use ($page) { if ($counter == 0) { print $page->block('gogo', 'text', 'Text-1') . '2
  • ' . $text . '' . $counter; }}, 1); ?>
